8b with this command: ollama run llama3 if you want to use a specific model size, use: ollama run llama3:8b ollama run llama3:70b here is youtube video if needed : step 4: use open webui for a chat interface for a better web experience, you can use open webui (formerly ollama web ui). if llama3 is running as mentioned, start open webui with docker using: docker run -d -p 3000:8080 --add-host=host.docker.internal:host-gateway -v open-webui:/app/backend/data --name open-webui --restart always ghcr.io/open-webui/open-webui:main this will let you access a chatgpt-like interface at http://localhost:3000 . step 5: create a local account youll see a sign-in or register box. this creates an account on your machine. step 6: start chatting choose llama3 as your model and start chatting, just like with chatgpt. enjoy! get my $3,000 chatbot code for free: full tutorial august 1, 2024 get my $3,000 chatbot code for free: full tutorial introduction are you an ai agency owner or a business looking t

o integrate a chatbot into your saas product? look no further! in my latest youtube video, im offering a step-by-step guide and free code to help you create a fully functional chatbot in just 5 minutes. this powerful, generative code is designed to make your work easier and more efficient. resources here is github link : https://github.com/saeedmaktekai/chatbot-in-5-min here is my youtube channel : link why use this code? the goal of this repository is to provide you with code that can be easily integrated into any saas or business application. this step-by-step process is perfect for anyone who wants to quickly set up a chatbot with minimal hassle. step-by-step guide to setting up your chatbot follow these simple steps to get your chatbot up and running on your local machine: step 1: clone the repository start by cloning the repository from github: git clone https://github.com/saeedmaktekai/chatbot-in-5-min.git cd chatbot-in-5-min step 2: create an .env file create a .env file in the

root directory of the project and add your openai api key: echo "openai_api_key=your_openai_api_key" > .env step 3: create and activate a virtual environment for windows: python -m venv myenv myenv\scripts\activate for macos and linux: python3 -m venv myenv source myenv/bin/activate step 4: install dependencies ensure you have python 3.8+ installed. install the required dependencies by running: pip install -r requirements.txt next, create a directory for your project: mkdir folder_name ensure to review and install all dependencies as mentioned in the requirements.txt file. step 5: configure the data directory modify the directory path in injection.py so that you can use your data for chatbot building. usage running the application first, run the injection.py file and provide the directory path where your data is stored. this data will be used to create the chatbot. enter your directory path after running it in the terminal: python injection.py then, run the chain.py script to create yo

ur chatbot: python chain.py conclusion with these simple steps, you can have a powerful chatbot up and running in just 5 minutes. dont miss out on this opportunity to streamline your workflow and enhance your business capabilities. for a detailed walkthrough, visit our youtube channel and watch the video linked below. visit our youtube channel happy coding! understanding ai and machine learning: a simple breakdown july 15, 2024 understanding ai and machine learning: a simple breakdown have you ever wondered how ai is different from machine learning? lets break it down into simple terms. in software development, we rely on human intelligence. ai (artificial intelligence) aims to replicate this human intelligence in machines, enabling them to perform tasks like face recognition, decision-making, and more. essentially, ai makes machines capable of performing tasks that typically require human intelligence. machine learning is a subset of ai. it involves feeding large amounts of data into

algorithms, which then learn from this data. by identifying patterns in the data, machine learning models become better at predicting and understanding things. this learned intelligence is used by ai to perform tasks that typically require human intelligence. in summary, ai is about making machines capable of performing human-like tasks, while machine learning is a method used within ai to help machines learn from data and improve their performance. check out my youtube video where i dive deeper into this topic: by clicking on the image above, you can watch my detailed explanation on youtube. why is this important? understanding the difference between ai and machine learning is crucial for anyone interested in technology today. whether youre a developer, a business owner, or just curious about tech, grasping these concepts can help you navigate the rapidly evolving landscape of artificial intelligence. how ai and machine learning impact our lives from personalized recommendations on st

reaming services to advanced diagnostic tools in healthcare, ai and machine learning are transforming various industries. by making machines smarter, we can automate repetitive tasks, make better decisions, and create innovative solutions that were once thought impossible. join the conversation i invite you to share your thoughts and questions in the comments below. lets discuss how ai and machine learning are shaping our world and what the future holds. for more insights and updates, dont forget to subscribe to my youtube channel https://www.youtube.com/@saeedmaktek and follow my blog. free ai chatbot code unleashed! easy 3-step setup & expert ai insights february 25, 2024 free ai chatbot code unleashed! easy 3-step setup & expert ai insights are you ready to dive into the world of ai chatbots? join me on an exciting journey as i share the secrets of developing powerful chatbot solutions. in this blog post, ill walk you through the process of creating a custom chatbot based on the ope

nai api, and ill even provide you with the code to get started. creating a chatbot can seem like a daunting task, but with the right approach, it can be a rewarding experience. in this video, ill break down the complex process of building a chatbot into three simple steps. whether youre a seasoned developer looking to expand your skills or someone just starting out in the world of ai, this guide is for you. step 1: understanding the basics before diving into chatbot development, its essential to understand the basics of ai and natural language processing (nlp). familiarize yourself with concepts like machine learning, neural networks, and how they apply to chatbot development. step 2: developing your chatbot once you have a solid understanding of the basics, its time to start developing your chatbot. start by defining the purpose of your chatbot and the specific tasks it will perform. then, choose the right technology stack for your project, including programming languages like python

and frameworks like tensorflow or pytorch. step 3: testing and deployment testing is a crucial step in the chatbot development process. ensure that your chatbot is capable of handling a variety of inputs and providing accurate responses. once youre satisfied with the performance of your chatbot, its time to deploy it to your desired platform and start interacting with users. by following these three simple steps, you can develop a powerful chatbot that can revolutionize your business or project. whether youre looking to streamline customer support, automate repetitive tasks, or provide personalized recommendations, ai chatbots offer a world of possibilities. so, what are you waiting for? start your journey into chatbot development today! a comprehensive guide from basics to advanced with saeed anwar february 25, 2024 a comprehensive guide from basics to advanced with saeed anwar are you ready to embark on a journey into the fascinating world of machine learning? join me, sayed anwar, c

eo of an ai development company in dubai, as i guide you through the ultimate roadmap to becoming a machine learning engineer! whether youre a beginner or looking to enhance your skills, this blog is packed with valuable insights and resources to help you succeed. in this tutorial, ill share my proven step-by-step approach to learning machine learning from scratch. well start by covering essential topics like statistics, probability, and the fundamental math behind machine learning, setting a solid foundation for your journey ahead. next, ill walk you through mastering python, a powerful tool for machine learning. ill show you how learning pandas and numpy beforehand can make your machine learning courses a breeze. discover a game-changing course by charles that covers pandas and numpy, laying the groundwork for your machine learning expertise. then, ill recommend the renowned machine learning specialization course by andrew ng, which spans linear regression, classification, supervised

and unsupervised learning, and more. with a clear understanding of machine learning basics, youll be empowered to choose your pathwhether its delving into deep learning or exploring other exciting possibilities in the field. this roadmap is your key to becoming a skilled machine learning engineer, ready to tackle real-world projects and stay ahead in the rapidly evolving ai landscape. unlock ai learning with coursera financial aid: a complete guide for students february 25, 2024 unlock ai learning with coursera financial aid: a complete guide for students are you a student eager to dive into the world of ai and python programming but worried about the costs? our latest youtube video offers a comprehensive guide to accessing advanced ai and python courses through courseras financial aid program. this video is a must-watch for students looking to stay ahead in the rapidly evolving field of ai and python development. we walk you through the simple steps to apply for financial aid on cour

sera, ensuring you dont miss out on crucial learning opportunities in natural language processing, generative ai, and more. whether youre a beginner or looking to advance your skills, this guide opens the door to a wealth of knowledge without the financial burden. join us to explore the potential of ai and python, enhance your skills, and become a part of the future of technology pricing ai expert consultation standard plan consulting call is the next leap in ai innovation at your fingertips? when it comes to brainstorming, strategic planning, feasibility analysis, business strategy and educational coaching for your ai journey i am an expert. document of consultation questions answers ongoing email support invite up to three guests free reschedules order now unlimited revisions contact contact with me nevine acotanza chief operating officer feel free to reach out for ai consultation or project inquiries! email: saeed@maktek.ai my social media your name phone number email subject your m
